mainHero.title: Stop phishing attacks with
mainHero.subtitle: PhishGuardX.
mainHero.description: Welcome to the ultimate destination for learning how to safeguard yourself against phishing attacks and understanding Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). In today's digital age, threats are everywhere, and it's crucial to arm yourself with knowledge and tools to stay secure.

items.title: Simulated Phishing Campaigns
items.description:
Out educational anti-phishing platform allows you to experience phishing attacks in a safe environment. You will be able to send simulated phishing campaigns that mimic real-life scenarios. 

 You'll learn to identify the red flags, understand the tricks used by attackers and develop a strong defense against these malicious attempts.

items.title: Cross-SiteScritping (XSS) Demystified
items.description: Understanding XSS is a critical component of web security. We offer comprehensive tutorials and hands-on exercises that will teach you how XSS attacks work. Gain insights into web vulnerabilities and become proficient at prevent and mitigating XSS threats.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: Your journey to digital safety starts here
features.description: Don't wait until you become a victim of phishing or XSS attacks. Take charge of your digital security today and join our anti-phishing platform. Whether you're a tech novice or a seasoned pro, our user-friendly resources will guide you through the intracies of online security.

items.name: Hands-On
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
